title: What is the best video recording software for Minecraft? - Quora

response.answer_text: Debut, Screen recorder and Video Capture software is a good bet for recording Games like Minecraft. Debut automatically detects when a full screen application, such as a game, is started. It will optimise settings for the full screen application. Recording will be restarted every time you switch between a full screen game and the desktop.

There is many good recorders, but I know two ones. Bandicam. This one can record almost every game, and has a screen recorder for stuff like web games.OBS. This is a broadcasting software (and is free) but it also records and has a lot of options, although, it is longer to set up, but more helpful.
